name: @anglr/common
description: Angular module for common angular stuff

scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:hmr && npm run build:forms && npm run build:router && npm run build:numeral && npm run build:hotkeys && npm run build:store && npm run build:moment && npm run build:structured-log && npm run build:positions
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map hmr/**/*.d.ts hmr/**/*.d.ts.map forms/**/*.d.ts forms/**/*.d.ts.map router/**/*.d.ts router/**/*.d.ts.map numeral/**/*.d.ts numeral/**/*.d.ts.map hotkeys/**/*.d.ts hotkeys/**/*.d.ts.map store/**/*.d.ts store/**/*.d.ts.map moment/**/*.d.ts moment/**/*.d.ts.map structured-log/**/*.d.ts structured-log/**/*.d.ts.map positions/**/*.d.ts positions/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:common && npm run doc:generate:hmr && npm run doc:generate:forms && npm run doc:generate:router && npm run doc:generate:numeral && npm run doc:generate:hotkeys && npm run doc:generate:store && npm run doc:generate:moment && npm run doc:generate:structured-log && npm run doc:generate:positions && npm run doc:save
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-common" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:common: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common && npm run doc:json:common && npm run doc:md:common
scripts.doc:md:common: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:hmr: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-hmr && npm run doc:json:hmr && npm run doc:md:hmr
scripts.doc:md:hmr: api-documenter markdown -i hmr/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-hmr && rimraf hmr/temp
scripts.doc:generate:forms: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-forms && npm run doc:json:forms && npm run doc:md:forms
scripts.doc:md:forms: api-documenter markdown -i forms/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-forms && rimraf forms/temp
scripts.doc:generate:router: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-router && npm run doc:json:router && npm run doc:md:router
scripts.doc:md:router: api-documenter markdown -i router/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-router && rimraf router/temp
scripts.doc:generate:numeral: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-numeral && npm run doc:json:numeral && npm run doc:md:numeral
scripts.doc:md:numeral: api-documenter markdown -i numeral/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-numeral && rimraf numeral/temp
scripts.doc:generate:hotkeys: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-hotkeys && npm run doc:json:hotkeys && npm run doc:md:hotkeys
scripts.doc:md:hotkeys: api-documenter markdown -i hotkeys/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-hotkeys && rimraf hotkeys/temp
scripts.doc:generate:store: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-store && npm run doc:json:store && npm run doc:md:store
scripts.doc:md:store: api-documenter markdown -i store/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-store && rimraf store/temp
scripts.doc:generate:moment: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-moment && npm run doc:json:moment && npm run doc:md:moment
scripts.doc:md:moment: api-documenter markdown -i moment/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-moment && rimraf moment/temp
scripts.doc:generate:structured-log: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-structured-log && npm run doc:json:structured-log && npm run doc:md:structured-log
scripts.doc:md:structured-log: api-documenter markdown -i structured-log/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-structured-log && rimraf structured-log/temp
scripts.doc:generate:positions: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-common-positions && npm run doc:json:positions && npm run doc:md:positions
scripts.doc:md:positions: api-documenter markdown -i positions/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-common-positions && rimraf positions/temp

author: kukjevov
